BR_text.BRsummary: Github action: The `set-env` command is deprecated and will be disabled soon.
BR_text.BRdescription:
Describe the bug
 The  command is deprecated and will be disabled soon. Please upgrade to using Environment Files. For more information see: <denchmark-link:https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/>https://github.blog/changelog/2020-10-01-github-actions-deprecating-set-env-and-add-path-commands/</denchmark-link>

 Describe how you solve it
 Affect all our CICD YAML
 <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
 
 Environment
